subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees need energy these days, and Johnny Damon, the center fielder who lost his job, is providing it.  After fighting through various leg injuries, Damon looks as spry as Melky Cabrera.
snippet: The Yankees need energy these days, and Johnny Damon, the center fielder who lost his job, is providing it.  After fighting through various leg injuries, Damon looks as spry as Melky Cabrera.
